text: 12.13: Sng 118.25-26; Mt 27.42; Zo 1.49Maaŋ muuŋgiap, mbe tumaraŋ nzari hargiap, anan puav tuavar veri. Mbe verav kaa khaŋ nzuai, “Nza Fhe Bakɨmen ndikndigi. Fhe Bakɨme tɨvir vhuuiŋ kha guman muuŋri. Ana Fhe Bakɨme zɨn panan zi. Fhe Bakɨme tɨvir vhuuiŋ kha guma muuŋri. Ana Isrerin ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan kɨrga.”
